title: Madness
features: As a starry-eyed child, I wanted to believe my shining prince would ride up on a white horse, present a diamond ring, and carry me away to his castle. His love would be endless and our lives would be the happily ever after all girls dreamed about. I never knew the fairytale was nothing more than a lie.I was a good girl.Until one night, one tiny trip, one little mistake, one moment of indiscretion.When I fell down the rabbit hole, I stumbled into the absolute fantasy, succumbing to their whims and rituals. As their very naughty girl, I embraced the nightmare and refused ever to leave.The Darkland is mine.And those monsters will kneel before their one true Queen.
description: If you crave the dark you will love this twisted spin of a classic tale."
Two Darlin Dolls and a Book Review
Kailee is either a genius at writing about madness
so you can't follow along or a
MASTER at evoking more than feelings..."
"This is an amazing piece of literature."
"Raw, unfiltered talent as a writer...able to capture your audience from the first page and lead them down a road that they never wanted to go, is the epitome of skill."
"It's utter brilliance the way this author takes a known story, develops these alternative ideas and weaves them in unforgettable tales."
It's clever. It's dark. Even disturbing, maybe a bit frightening. It's detailed too. And smoking hot. Most definitely a whole lot of strange. Odd and original. Well, you get the drift."
- TAT Books(epic-coming of age-dark mafia saga/series)
